logicalColumns.name: # of SRs Resolved in under 24 hrs

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IN ('ORA_SVC_RESOLVED', 'ORA_SVC_CLOSED') AND %2 <>  TO_DATETIME('01/01/1901 00:00', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi') AND %3 = 'N' AND 1.0d *  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_MINUTE , %4, %2) / 60.0d < 24 THEN %5 END
